entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
